text:
2019 looks like a bright year for Alia Bhatt. Currently, she is enjoying the success of her last release Gully Boy and side by side, she is also promoting her upcoming film Brahmastra. But Alia has been making news for some other reasons as well.
Agencies
According to several reports, Alia Bhatt has bought a new house so that she could live in with her boyfriend Ranbir Kapoor. If reports are to be believed, Alia and Ranbir have been dating for over an year now and if all goes well, the couple might exchange rings and make it official soon.
(Also read: Ranbir-Alia Pose For Media As They Leave For Kumbh To Unveil The First Look Of Brahmastra!)
Twitter

But the new house has nothing to do with boyfriend Ranbir, confirms Alia. Clarifying the rumors, Alia Bhatt spoke to Bollywoodhungama and confirmed that the house is no love nest, instead, she is planning to convert it into her office. She says,
Agencies
“Nothing of the sort. It is a place I’ve bought as my office space. Yes, I’ve started my own production house. I’ve named it Eternal Sunshine Productions. Do you like it? Firstly, I bought this home where I live very close to my parent’s home so that I could be close to my parents and sister. I wouldn’t like that to change. Secondly, I built my home brick by brick all my own. Every piece of furniture in the house every knickknack is selected personally by me. This is where I live. This is my home. That won’t change."
After Priyanka Chopra and Deepika Padukone, Alia Bhatt is the new entrant in the producer's club and we are more than glad!
title: Film Production To Buying Her Own Home, Alia Bhatt Is Conquering Life, One New Thing At A Time!
